attributes.additional_details:
The media is constantly trying to cover up muslim "grooming" gangs (rape/trafficking/pimping/slavery gangs) that gang rape and forcably pimp out young white girls, still children! This disgusting crime is even silenced by the term "grooming" (you groom your dog or your hair!This is child sex slavery/racist gang rape!) and this petion is to protest the silence from polititions and the mass media and to make them admit this evil disgusting crime is going on rather than trying to brush it under the table!

Children this vunerable deserve better than this travesty of justice! How these evil perverts can do this is one thing, how the media/polititions can hush it up is another! Lets expose this evil for what it is and make them accountable for this breech of human rights!!!!
